Which category does the rightmost axis represent in this sankey chart?

VPR.A: The largest flow is between {Commercial Property} and {First-time Buyer}.

VPR.Q: Which pair of nodes shows the smallest flow in this sankey chart?
VPR.A: The smallest flow is between {Retiree} and {Cash Purchase}.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from the node Retiree to the node Mortgage?
VE.A: The flow value from the node Retiree to the node Mortgage is {269}.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from the node First-time Buyer to the node Mortgage?
VE.A: The flow value from the node First-time Buyer to the node Mortgage is {311}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value from the node Retiree to the next stage in the sankey chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value from the node Retiree to the next stage is {269}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value from the node First-time Buyer to the next stage in the sankey chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value from the node First-time Buyer to the next stage is {96}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from node Commercial Property?
SC.A: The total flow output from node Commercial Property is {1120}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by node First-time Buyer?
SC.A: The total flow input by node First-time Buyer is {656}.

NF.Q: In the column Buyer Types of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 259? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.
NF.A: {Investor} has an outflow of {383}, {First-time Buyer} has an outflow of {311}, {Retiree} has an outflow of {269}.

NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Property Types and column Buyer Types is the flow between 292 and 388? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {386} from node {Commercial Property} to {Investor}, a flow of {331} from node {Commercial Property} to {Retiree}.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 251 and 261? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.
NF.A: There is a flow of {253} from node {Single Family Home} to {First-time Buyer}.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node First-time Buyer to node Mortgage and from node Retiree to node Mortgage, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {First-time Buyer} to node {Mortgage} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Retiree to node Cash Purchase, from node Investor to node Cash Purchase, and from node First-time Buyer to node Lease-to-Own, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Investor} to node {Cash Purchase} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Property Types of the sankey chart is the most critical?
MSR.A: The most critical node in the column Property Types is {Commercial Property}.

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Single Family Home to target node Cash Purchase? Please list all node labels along this path.
MSR.A: The path with the highest total flow from node Single Family Home to node Cash Purchase is: {Single Family Home, Investor, Cash Purchase}.
